app.title: DepaTrack
app.description: Lightweight web app to log and track apartment-rental prospects with local-first architecture and offline support.
app.noPropertiesWithFilters: No properties match the applied filters. Try adjusting your search criteria.
app.noProperties: No properties registered. Add the first one!

auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
auth.dontHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.signInToSaveData: Sign in to save your data to the cloud
auth.signInDescription: Sign in to sync your properties across devices
auth.signUpDescription: Create an account to sync your properties across devices
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address to receive password reset instructions
auth.registrationSuccessMessage: We've sent a verification email to your address. Please check your inbox and click the verification link, then sign in below.
auth.passwordResetEmailSent: Password reset email sent! Check your inbox for instructions.
auth.expiredVerificationLink: Verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.invalidVerificationLinkCheckEmail: Invalid verification link. Please check your email.
auth.verifyingEmailMessage: Please wait while we verify your email address.
auth.emailVerifiedMessage: Your email has been verified. You can now sign in to DepaTrack and start tracking your property prospects.
auth.expiredPasswordResetLink: Password reset link has expired. Please request a new one.
auth.invalidPasswordResetLinkCheckEmail: Invalid password reset link. Please check your email.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.passwordTooWeak: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.
auth.failedToResetPassword: Failed to reset password. Please try again.
auth.verifyingResetLinkMessage: Please wait while we verify your password reset link.
auth.passwordResetSuccessfulMessage: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now sign in with your new password.

stats.title: Property Statistics
stats.description: Overview of your property tracking progress
stats.totalTooltip: Total number of properties you're tracking
stats.priceTooltip: Average rental price across all properties
stats.availableTooltip: Properties you haven't contacted yet - ready to reach out
stats.activeTooltip: Properties you're actively working on - contacted, visiting, negotiating, or applying
stats.completedTooltip: Properties where you succeeded - approved applications or places you rented
stats.rejectedTooltip: Properties that didn't work out - rejected, over budget, or no longer interested
stats.progressTooltip: Shows how many properties have reached a final outcome (completed or rejected) vs still in progress

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Set up filters to narrow down your property search

import.title: Import Properties
import.noPropertiesFoundMessage: No valid properties found in the CSV file
import.confirmMessage: This will add {count} new properties to your existing data. Are you sure you want to continue?

validation.pricePositive: Price must be greater than or equal to 0
validation.validPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

delete.title: Delete Property
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this property? This action cannot be undone.
